login.title: Get Jässäri!
login.helpText: The membership card gives you access to youth hostels. As a youth membership owner, you can spend an evening in a disco or nightclub, hang out in a youth club, practice in a band camp, do a DJ class, practice dancing, theater or handicrafts, apply for project money, attend summer camps or even create your own event.
login.linkForMembersText: Do you have membership? Log in

registration.title: Please fill in your information
registration.membershipInfoText: Add information about what membership can get and what it is used for.
registration.photoUsageApprovedText: I can be photographed and photos can be used in internal and external communications in the City of Helsinki.
registration.approverInfoText: A confirmation request for your Nuta membership will be sent to this address, the guardian will verify the information and accept the membership.
registration.confirmSend: Accept the terms and send the application
registration.processInfoText: A data verification request will be sent to the parent and once they have reviewed and approved the information, your membership will take effect.
registration.approveTermsText_2: . I can be contacted via address I have given.
registration.ageRestriction: Only 8-29 years old can create youth profile.

confirmSendingProfile.title: The application has been sent to your guardian for approval!
confirmSendingProfile.helpText: Your membership application has been sent to

approval.title: Please approve membership of Nuta
approval.formExplanationText_1: has sent you Nuta membership request for approval. By approving the membership,
approval.formExplanationText_2: could use services for youth and get benefits. In case of incorrect data, ask youth to edit info and send a new request.
approval.name: Name
approval.photoUsageApprovedText: Giving permission to use photos of my child for Helsinki internal and external media purposes.
approval.approverInfoText: Guardian may be contacted concerning the child.
approval.approveTermsText_2: . I can be contacted via address I have given.
approval.approvedMessage: Thank you for confirming youth service membership.
approval.approvedLink: Application is already approved / link is defective
